title: Traptrix Rafflesia

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -You may use any trap hole in the game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You may perform both the factional kill and use a trap hole.
-You do not gain a trap hole at the start of the game.
-You may use both your ability and play a trap hole in the same night.

desc:
Post 2966
*You call us parasites, but really, all we do is kill you*
